title: Stream: AlunaGeorge – Body Music
body:
Showcasing their debut LP with a first of its kind blog-orientated promotional campaign ([more info here](http://bodymusic.alunageorge.com/)), British dance duo **AlunaGeorge** have made **_Body Music_** available for online streaming, ahead of its release next week. Having featured on **Disclosure’s** smash hit _White Noise_, the London two, piece who came second in BBC’s Sound of 2013, are set to follow in the footsteps of their previous collaborators. With a series of hyped shows at festivals over this summer, including playing to a packed tent at Glastonbury, **_Body Music_** is a record packed full of potential singles. Featuring the previously heard _You Know You Like It_, _Attracting Flies_ and _Your Drums, Your Love_, you can expect **_Body Music_** to be one of the most played records of the summer.

_**Body Music**_ is released next week on [Vagrant](http://www.vagrant.com/).
